org.jacp.api.action

Interface IActionListener<L,A,M>

  • Type Parameters:
    L - defines the basic listener type
    M - defines the type of message ActionEvent
    A - defines the type of ActionEvent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FXActionListener

    public interface IActionListener<L,A,M>
    Handles implementation specific Listener to perform events. This Interface is an abstraction to hide toolkit specific event/action details.
    Author:
    Andy Moncsek

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IAction<A,M> getAction()
      Returns the action.
      <C extends L> 
      C      		 getListener()
      Returns implementation specific ActionListener.
      void notifyComponents(IAction<A,M> action)
      Notify component when action fired.
      void performAction(A event)
      Abstraction to handle actions/events uniform on different toolkits.

    • Method Detail

      • notifyComponents

        void notifyComponents(IAction<A,M> action)
        Notify component when action fired.
        Parameters:
        action - ; the action fired by components

      • getAction

        IAction<A,M> getAction()
        Returns the action.
        Returns:
        an action instance

      • getListener

        <C extends L> C getListener()
        Returns implementation specific ActionListener. All listeners should extend java.util.EventListener.
        Type Parameters:
        C - ; the specific listener type
        Returns:
        a new listener instance

      • performAction

        void performAction(A event)
        Abstraction to handle actions/events uniform on different toolkits. Method invokes toolkit specific handle method perform event call.
        Parameters:
        event - ; proxy to common event handlers
